text: Kirill Vladimirovich Pokrovsky (; 25 March 1962 - 1 June 2015) was a Russian composer and performer. He wrote the soundtrack for the Divinity series of video games produced by Larian Studios. He was born in Moscow. Pokrovsky died on 1 June 2015 in Belgium, aged 53. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Musicians from Moscow Category:Russian composers Category:Russian singers
title: Kirill Pokrovsky
